item.title: Review: Buffalo Souls
item.description:
Review: Buffalo Souls

Side projects can be a tricky business. When it comes to music, an artist's side project often comes nowhere close to the artistic quality than his original ventures; but it is often crucial for an artist to get some ideas off his chest. The artist who chooses to share this "artistic vomit" (as our reviewee...

item.title: Australian Music Network
item.description:
Australian Music Network

Those naturally free or wild parts of us that get lost or pushed out is what Dan Snyder's alternative side project, Buffalo Souls stands for.

item.title: FORKSTER MUSIC
item.description:
FORKSTER MUSIC

They are an extremely captivating rock sound that bring melodic atmospheres with huge vocal/music airs that are absolutely radiating fantastically with genre elements of alternative/pop, truly an uplifting/passionate listen!

item.title: A Conversation with Paper Lights
item.description:
A Conversation with Paper Lights

I recently got to talk with Dan Snyder, a founding member of the indie post-rock group Paper Lights. We talked about their new album We Are Arrows, the off-stage dynamics of being in a band, and ways people - artists and commissioners - can support good music. Read on...
